greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First difference sequence of A007617. Difference between consecutive values not being in the range of phi[A000010].
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: a(n) is either 2 or 1 since odd numbers are in A007619;
if a(n)=1 then A007619[n+1] is an even number not in
range of phi; n={11,13,14,15,17} are not in the range of
phi and the corresponding differences are {2,1,1,2}.
mathematica: t0[x_] := Table[j, {j, 1, x}] t=Table[EulerPhi[w], {w, 1, 10000}]; u=Union[%]; c=Complement[t0[10000], u]; Delete[c-RotateRight[c], 1]
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, May 20 2003
